text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Colonel Juan Alberto Perote asked general Enrique Rodriguez Galindo for help before implicating him in GAL case
- Popular Party decided after March 3 election to substitute Aleix Vidal-Quadras as party leader in Catalonia and move close to Catalan nationalist coalition CiU
- World's top psychiatrists meet in Madrid
- Bundesbank cuts rates and Europe celebrates
- Bundesbank smooths the path for European economic growth
